Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line and Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed near Adams/Wabash
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing Adams/Wabash due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing Adams/Wabash due to signal problems. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

As a result of the delayed train, shuttle buses have been requested as followed:

  • from 35th to Clark/Lake to provide connecting service for the Green line in both directions
  • from Halsted to Clark/Lake to provide connecting service for the Orange Line in both directions

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
